trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_SEQ_00<tab>The Whilom River's new inhabitants are too much for this hunter to bear.

TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_SEQ_01<tab>A burly gang of bears has taken up residence upstream of the Whilom River. A troubled hunter has asked you to scare them away so that he might resume his hunting. Slay four bears to send the rest running to a new watering hole.
TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_SEQ_02<tab>Four bears now lie at the bottom of the Whilom River. Return to the hunter and tell him of the slaughter.

TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_SEQ_03<tab>The hunter seems relieved, but says he must wait for supplies and a change of weather before he resumes his work. Hopefully no more bears decide to return in the meantime.
TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_HUNTER01780_000_010<tab>Have you been upstream of the Whilom River yet? Used to be prime huntin' grounds...that is, till the bears moved in.

TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_HUNTER01780_000_011<tab>Used to be we would hide in the waterfall's basin and lie in wait till a chocobo came 'round for a drink. It was easy pickin's, it was... But the bears are makin' it difficult.

TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_HUNTER01780_000_012<tab>Someone needs to send them runnin' so we can get back to huntin'─and you look capable enough! Send four down to the bottom of the basin and I'll make it worth your while.
TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_HUNTER01780_000_020<tab>We haven't been able to catch a single bird since the bears moved in upstream. Take down four of them and I'll make sure you're rewarded.

TEXT_HEAVNZ211_01780_HUNTER01780_000_030<tab>I wager those bears regret gettin' in the way of our huntin' now! All that's left is to restock on supplies and wait till it gets a li'l warmer and we can move back upstream.
